SELECT w.id id, w.content content, date_format(w.create_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') createTime, date_format(w.update_time, '%Y.%m.%d %T') updateTime, u.nickname, u.id teacherName, w.brief, w.capacity, w.course_date courseDate, w.tuition, w.create_user, w.update_user, w.grade, w.tuition_type tuitionType, w.tuition_sub_type tuitionSubType, w.final_tuition finalTuition, w.teacher_type teacherType, w.status status, w.need_training_aid needTrainingAid, w.phone,w.price,w.recommend_brand recommendBrand, sys_attach.origin_fileName originFileName, sys_attach.id attachId FROM course_teacher w LEFT JOIN sys_user u ON w.teacher_name = u.id left JOIN sys_attach on w.id= sys_attach.business_id and sys_attach.type='course-teacher'
WHERE w.delete_status = '1'
AND w.content like concat(concat('%',#{content}),'%')
AND w.course_date like concat(concat('%',#{courseDate}),'%')
AND w.create_user = #{author}
and w.status = 'publish' and w.id not in (select course_id from course_student where select_user_id = #{studentCanPick} and delete_status = '1' )
AND w.grade like concat(concat('%',#{studentGradeFilter}),'%')
LIMIT #{offSet}, #{pageRow}

select sys_user.id, sys_user.username, sys_user.nickname, sys_user.nickname_cn, sys_user.phone from sys_user left join sys_role on sys_user.role_id=sys_role.id WHERE (sys_role.group_tag = 2 or sys_role.group_tag = 0 or group_tag = -1) and sys_user.delete_status = 1 and sys_user.active_status=1;
